input.sentences: well here we are at the freak and weirdos summer party .
i have no idea who this guy is but he keeps photobombing me pictures .
well hello ... nope | maybe after a few more beers . many | many more beers ...
it 's getting kind of crowded in here . i 'm not sure i like being in such close proximity to all these weirdos ...
... well okay | maybe things are looking up . let 's get this party started !
output.sentences: I threw a party this summer with all of my weirdo friends.
My boyfriend thought it would be a good idea to photo bomb all the pictures.
People kept offering me beer, but I said , "nope."
I had never seen so many weirdos in such a close proximity.
When my sister showed up in her gold bikini, it really started the party.
